text:
No need to define it yourself, just use the `binomial(n,r)` function for nCr, its in base Julia. Also what is meant by solving? Do you mean getting the value of the pmf? If so, the load the `Distributions` package and use the pdf of Binomial (notice the case sensitive-its different from binomial above):
```using Distributions
pdf(Binomial(18,0.1),2) #Binomial(n,p) 
#gives 0.2835```
